Text: how do i unload this and put it on disc??
This is a great film, how can u upload it and make it a prob for d/l you prick
lmao @ prick..im a prick because you dont know how to use nero and burn the image file? or maybe open it with vlc player..you fucking moronic bastard

you burn this type of file to cd-r's not dvd's. i use nero 7. first i open nero express..then i go down to disk image or saved project option..i open up the folder that has the file in it i click it and it takes me to the burn process..thats it. use an 80 min. cd-r and set it to 84 min over burn. takes about 10 min if you use 8x speed. and will play in any dvd player that supports vcd format

I apologise for my rude comments. Of course it is easy to burn when you know how!!
Thanks for the help.

no problem man just ask next time..oh and you can 
use isobuster to extract the mpegav file to a folder and you can burn it to dvd or watch it on media player but the picture isnt as clear..its intended for cd-r's..
